heroData.description: Passionate about technology and implementing incredible solutions and designs using:

aboutItems.text: I'm a Systems Engineering student based in Peru.

Among the technologies that I use, I like to work mainly with React, Node.js (with Express) and with one of the technologies with which I interact the most and I think it has a lot of potential: Next.js.
I'm a true believer that we never stop learning, which is why I'm always trying new technologies. I was recently testing Vue.js
